Volcano

A volcano is a physical construct found in some creations consisting of a natural rupture in the crust of a hard, natural, phsyical mass such as a Spire or planet, which allows hot lava, volcanic ash, gases, or other hot matter to escape from a chamber below the surface.

Volcanos in Creations

Marlien

Volcanoes in the Creation of Marlien exist on The Material Plane, The Fire Plane, and other planes.

Totum

Voclanoes may be found upon planets in the Creation of Totum (volcanoes in Totum).

A volcano is a rupture in the crust of Marlien or on an individual a Spire , such as Naltera, that allows hot lava, volcanic ash, and gases to escape from a magma chamber below the surface, comparable to a planetary volcano in the creation of Totum.

Volcanos occur both on spires, and on the mountainous plane itself, where they are often the route of interesting astrological and astonomic phenomenon, possibly including the birth of stars.
